stab.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to push a knife into someone or something
stab.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He was stabbed to death in a fight.
She had been stabbed in the chest repeatedly.
stab somebody in the heart/arm etc
stab.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to make quick pushing movements with your finger or something pointed
stab.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He raised his voice and stabbed the air with his pen.
stab.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an act of stabbing or trying to stab someone with a knife
stab.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He killed him with a stab to the heart.
